adjectives.description: careerist (comparative more careerist, superlative most careerist)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to such a person or way of life
(derogatory) A person who pursues the advancement of their career at the expense of other values.
examples: A careerist is a square-filler, a time-server. His talents and imagination have been circumscribed to perform managerial duties.

entries.meaning: A person who takes a job, especially in the military, for a long time rather than temporarily.
